author: didnkallaehawe
title: Bees Delivery DAO
description: Most delivery systems today in developing countries such as CMR are centralized and do not leverage advantages offered by the local context.
solution: Build a decentralized delivery system that leverages moto-taxis, and inter-city buses to create a more efficient system for all stakeholders
experience: Wada Cameroon Hub: 3 senior software architects and developers
